articles.title: Nippon and US Steel complete controversial merger - BBC
articles.summary: Japan's Nippon seals controversial US Steel deal after Trump pact Japanese firm Nippon Steel has completed its long-sought takeover of US Steel, after agreeing to yield unusual control to the US government. Nippon's $14. 9bn (£11bn) purchase of the smaller American company, will create one of the world's biggest steelmakers and turns Nippon into a major player in the US.
